# Creating the environment

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tosr)
library(bibliometrix)
library(sjrdata)
library(journalabbr)
library(gt)
```

# Data getting

```{r}
data_science <- 
  tosr::tosr_load("DCA 467 15 July 2021.bib", 
                  "DCA 467 15 July 2021.txt")
```

```{r}
data_science$df |> 
  filter(str_detect(DT, "ARTICLE")) |> 
  select(journal = SO, data_base = ref_type) |> 
  na.omit() |> 
  add_count(journal) |> 
  unique() |> 
  filter(!duplicated(journal)) |> 
  arrange(desc(n)) |> 
  slice(1:10) |> 
  rename(publications = n) |> 
  gt()
```
